item.title: Return of the Meme: 1618 (gentle giants)
item.description:
Let's get this bread. (Not my jam, but it's probably someone's)
I made enough cash this weekend that I decided I could justify leaving the house and going over the mountain yesterday to go see Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die. It has left me with Feels I cant really explain to anyone who hasn't seen it. Fuck.
All the things that could have happened. Didn't happen. Will never happen, because I am now out of chances.
So it goes.
But i also stopped by Watson Lake and snuck in a bit of birding, and added four birds to my year list: Snow Goose, Ring-billed Gull, California Gull, and Eared Greve, which now brings my year list to a cozy 102 birds.
But anyway. Yeah. Feels.
It's me. Definitely me.
All smöl wrens are forged by the gods. Cactus Wrens, on the other hand, were definitely forged by clowns. They are clowns. I've seen them eating Pizza slices.
Podcast reccomendation if you're into birds: The Extremely Accurate Birds Podcast.
I really thought about pouring myself some apple brandy last night after I got home from the movie, bit played some wingspan, had a dinner, and went to bed early instead.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: [Imitation of coughing noises] ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin

item.title: Andrew Tate should be behind bars. But Trump gave him a path to escape justice.
item.description: Andrew Tate and his brother were serving time in a Romanian prison. But Trump's presidential envoy, the infamous Richard Grenell, pressured Romanian officials to release Tate for extradition to the USA to face charges there. And what happened? THEY WERE DISMISSED. Andrew Tate is a free man once again. TikTok, Twitter (X), and YouTube gave Tate's videos algorithmic pushes to young men. They've made a lot of money off of Tate's sexually abusive and misogynistic content. When questioned about him after confirmed crimes, there was no comment. His videos are still being pushed on these platforms. He's making money. EDIT: *** THANK YOU, for the Accolades! ***

item.title: We know of so many things, but knowing isn't experiencing.
item.description:
Just to sit at the top of the tunnel was so moving because it is experiencing a fragment of the what people experienced to fight for their freedom. Some fight for freedom with guns and tanks, some fight for freedom holding nothing but a candle for light as the make their way through a tiny tunnel.
https://www.instagram.com/cherylwills_ny1

item.title: Polish Freedom "Hero Cow"
item.description: https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-43112770 A cow set for a slaughterhouse has instead escaped, by ramming a fence and swimming to an island. The runaway bovine has sought sanctuary on the islands of Lake Nyskie in southern Poland for the past few weeks. Its owner gave up on capturing the animal after attempts to retrieve it led the cow to repeatedly swim off. Calls to have the cow shot have been met with fierce opposition, with one local politician saying he has made it his mission to save the "hero cow". It all started when the animal was being led towards a truck bound for an abattoir, Polish website Wiadomosci reported. Her owner, only known as Mr Lukasz, advised handlers to tranquilise the cow but failing to heed that warning, they were overpowered by the animal.

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @MatthewTak 's daily sketch was this one! Love it! Check out all their other stuff in their posts. So much greatness.
27 Man Tax: Chris Evans
“You may not believe in evolution, and that is all right. How we humans came to be the way we are is far less important than how we should act now to get out of the mess we have made for ourselves.” - Jane Goodall So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me
